plank_2x4.name: Plank 2x4
plank_2x4.description: A wooden plank that could be used for all kinds of crafting and construction

steel_scrap.name: Steel scrap
steel_scrap.description: Some metal bits and pieces. Useful for something, right?

bullet_9mm.name: bullet 9mm
bullet_9mm.description: Standard type of ammunition. Very common.

pistol_magazine.name: Pistol magazine
pistol_magazine.description: In order for your pistol to fire a bullet, it needs to have a magazine loaded with bullets

pistol_9mm.name: Pistol 9mm
pistol_9mm.description: A standard issue pistol that uses 9mm ammunition

rifle_m4a1.name: M4a1 rifle
rifle_m4a1.description: A standard issue rifle that uses 9mm ammunition

chugunov_mpap.name: Chugunov MPAP
chugunov_mpap.description: Chugun in Russian is for cast steel, MPAP is "Multi Purpose Automatic Pistol"

chugunov_mpap_magazine.name: Chuganov MPAP magazine
chugunov_mpap_magazine.description: A magazine to be loaded into a Chuganov MPAP

bottle_plastic_empty.name: Empty plastic bottle
bottle_plastic_empty.description: This plastic bottle only contains air

bottle_plastic_water.name: Plastic bottle with water
bottle_plastic_water.description: This plastic bottle is filled with water

canned_food.name: Canned food
canned_food.description: The contents will satisfy your hunger

machete.name: Machete
machete.description: A sharp blade with a handle for excellent control

wood_arrow_basic.name: Basic wooden arrow
wood_arrow_basic.description: Anyone is able to craft this simple arrow

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.description: A stick with a block of steel on it. It is used to apply force to objects like nails

screwdriver.name: Screwdriver
screwdriver.description: A handle with a rod of steel in it. The tip can be flat or shaped like a star. Useful for construction projects

bandage_basic.name: Bandage
bandage_basic.description: A basic bandage that will help to heal a wound

bottle_antibiotics.name: Bottle of antibiotics
bottle_antibiotics.description: A small bottle that contains antibiotics. It helps to recover from disease.

jacket.name: Jacket
jacket.description: A piece of clothing to wear on the torso. It will keep you warm and offers a bit of protection.

boots.name: Boots
boots.description: Comfortable footwear to keep your feet safe

jerrycan_gasoline.name: Jerrycan of gasoline
jerrycan_gasoline.description: A large container that holds gasoline

can_oil.name: Can of oil
can_oil.description: It's a can that contains oil. It has a spout that allows you to pour it out.

radio_handheld.name: Handheld radio
radio_handheld.description: A small radio that can be powered by batteries or an electical cord.

flashlight_basic.name: Flashlight
flashlight_basic.description: A basic battery powered flashlight. It will shine a beam of light when it is turned on

can_beer.name: Can of beer
can_beer.description: It's a can that contains beer. Don't drink a lot of it or you will get drunk

gas_mask.name: Gas mask
gas_mask.description: A piece of clothing that offers protection from environmental hazards

vest_ballistic.name: Ballistic vest
vest_ballistic.description: A piece of clothing that offers protection from ballistic forces

compass.name: Compass
compass.description: A device that shows your orientation relative to the earth's poles

battery_small.name: Small battery
battery_small.description: A very common type of battery that fits most battery-powered devices

solar_panel.name: Solar panel
solar_panel.description: A large panel that draws power from the sun

map_paper.name: Paper map
map_paper.description: A large piece of paper that visualizes the area around you

tarp.name: Tarp
tarp.description: A piece of fabric and some strings. You can deploy it to get some shelter from the weather

tent.name: Tent
tent.description: A piece of fabric and some strings. You can deploy it to get some shelter from the weather. It is currently folded to save space.

guide_survival_basic.name: Basic survival guide
guide_survival_basic.description: A small book explaining the very basics of survival

book_novel.name: Novel
book_novel.description: A book containing an entertaining story

bottle_disinfectant.name: Bottle of disinfectant
bottle_disinfectant.description: A small bottle that contains disinfectant. It helps to disinfect wounds

radio_two_way.name: Two way radio
radio_two_way.description: A small radio that allows you to communicate with someone over a large distance

firestarter_basic.name: Firestarter
firestarter_basic.description: A small device that provides a spark that can be used to light a fire. No power or fuel required.

kit_fishing_small.name: Small fishing kit
kit_fishing_small.description:
A true survival fishing kit in a very small, lightweight package!
    Contains 118 foot line and winder
    2 lures, 2 hooks
    2 swivels, 2 weghts
    Comes in a strong durable heavy duty resealable plastic bag

kitchen_knife.name: Kitchen Knife
kitchen_knife.description: A versatile kitchen tool, essential for slicing, dicing, and chopping food.

portable_stove.name: Portable Stove
portable_stove.description: A compact and portable stove, perfect for cooking meals during survival situations.

cooking_pot.name: Cooking Pot
cooking_pot.description: A durable cooking pot, essential for boiling water and preparing meals.

can_opener.name: Can opener
can_opener.description: A small tool crucial for opening canned food, an essential for survival.

cutting_board.name: Cutting Board
cutting_board.description: A sturdy cutting board, ideal for preparing food safely and efficiently.

mixing_bowl.name: Mixing Bowl

tea_kettle.name: Tea Kettle

spice_rack.name: Spice Rack

rolling_pin.name: Rolling Pin

frying_pan.name: Frying Pan

steel_colander.name: Colander

peeler.name: Peeler

grater.name: Grater
grater.description: A metal grater, essential for shredding cheese, vegetables, and more.

toaster.name: Toaster
toaster.description: A compact electric toaster, ideal for toasting bread quickly.

blender.name: Blender
blender.description: An electric blender, perfect for making smoothies, soups, and other blended concoctions.

coffee_maker.name: Coffee Maker
coffee_maker.description: A coffee maker, essential for brewing the perfect cup of coffee to start your day.

microwave_oven.name: Microwave Oven

dish_rack.name: Dish Rack

pressure_cooker.name: Pressure Cooker

bread_maker.name: Bread Maker
bread_maker.description: A bread maker, perfect for effortlessly baking fresh bread at home.

nails.name: Nails

log.name: Log

screw.name: Screw

branch.name: Branch

leaf.name: Leaf

soil.name: Soil

plant_remnants.name: Plant Remnants

electrical_components.name: Electrical Components

brick.name: Brick

glass_shards.description: Sharp pieces of broken glass, dangerous but potentially useful in crafting.

damaged_transmitter.description: An old, damaged transmitter that seems to emit faint radio signals. It needs repairs before it can be used

transmitter.description: A fully functional transmitter, capable of boosting a weak signal when paired with the right equipment.

radio_tower_key.name: Radio tower key
radio_tower_key.description: A metallic key that grants access to the control panel of the radio tower.

wallet.name: Wallet
wallet.description: A worn leather wallet containing faded photographs and a few crumpled bills

wrist_watch.name: Wallet
wrist_watch.description: A worn leather wallet containing faded photographs and a few crumpled bills

rotten_flesh_chunk.name: Chunk of Rotten Flesh
rotten_flesh_chunk.description: A disgusting chunk of decaying flesh, oozing with a foul stench.

zombie_bone.description: A broken bone fragment, brittle but sharp.

zombie_eye.name: Zombie Eye
zombie_eye.description: A cloudy, lifeless eye. It's unsettling to look at.

zombie_organ.name: Decayed Organ
zombie_organ.description: A grotesque internal organ, bloated and putrid.

charcoal_chunk.name: Charcoal Chunk
charcoal_chunk.description: A chunk of charcoal, created by burning wood. Useful as fuel or for crafting.

wood_bundle.name: Wood Bundle
wood_bundle.description: A sturdy bundle of wood pieces tied together, used for creating a stable fire base.

kiwi.name: Kiwi
kiwi.description: A fresh, juicy kiwi, rich in vitamins and fiber.

uncooked_meat.name: Uncooked Meat

pack_cigarettes.name: Pack of cigarettes
pack_cigarettes.description: It's a carton pack that contains cigarettes. You need a fire source to light them and start smoking
